set-variable.title: Set Variable
set-variable.description: Stores a value in the execution context using a given variable name

variableName.title: Variable Name
variableName.description: The name to use for the stored variable

delete-variable.title: Delete Variable
delete-variable.description: Deletes a value from the execution context

variableName.title: Variable Name
variableName.description: The name of the variable to delete
